subject: GOOGLE INTERNET LOTTERY AWARDS
body:
GOOGLE INTERNET LOTTERY AWARDS
GOOGLE AWARDS CENTER
#: 1600 Amphitheatre Pkwy Mountain View, CA 94043, USA
 
Dear Email Owner,
 
CONGRATULATIONS!!!
 
This is to notify you that you have won the sum of $1,000,000.00 USD (One Million United States dollars) 
prize money from Google Fiber's 2024 Prize promotion, which was exclusively open to Gmail Users.
 
Google! Gathers all Gmail.com users who are Active this 2024, including a small percentage from other email providers and the millions of users who have signed up for Google Gmail. You are one of the Selected Winners for the month of February 2024, and 10 users benefits from this promotion each month.
 
Winners will get payment according to their Settlement Centers, prizes that aren't claimed within the time frame will be forfeited and sent back to the original source as unclaimed funds.
 
STATED BELOW ARE YOUR IDENTIFICATION NUMBERS:
BATCH NUMBER: MFI/07/APA-53659
REFERENCE NUMBER: 2000234523
FILE NUMBER: G/USA76-441/2024
 
PAYMENT OF PRIZE / CLAIMS
For you to receive your US$1,000,000.00 Dollars (One Million United States Dollars). Please get in touch with your claim representative as indicated below. Your payment file will be forwarded to the designated payment bank once he has completed processing it. The bank will then get in touch with you to arrange an immediate transfer of your funds to any designated bank account.
 
Contact information for your claim agent.
Agent: Mr. Alfred Davidson Jr.
Contact Email:  
aubesrahanopoz@gmail.com
Phone Number:  +1 (804) 534-7182
WhatsApp Number: +1 (804) 534-7182
 
Please send him the information listed below.
1. Full Names:
2. Country:
3. Age:
4. Occupation:
5. Mobile Number:
 
Send the above aforementioned details to make your claim. The only person you should get in touch with is (Mr. Alfred Davidson Jr.), the agent stated above, who will give you instructions on how to claim your prize money. To prevent duplicate claims, kindly keep your winning Reference Numbers private.
 
Congratulations Once again.
 
Regards,
 
MRS. JANE WRIGHT.
(AWARDS NOTIFICATION OFFICER).

subject: Re: GOOGLE INTERNET LOTTERY AWARDS
body:
Hello! That sounds exciting to have won a prize from Google Internet Lottery Awards. Can you tell me more about how the selection process works and what steps I need to take to claim the prize money?

Best wishes,
Mildred
